title: Kristina Schulman and Co-Host Demi Burnett
description:
Rachel is joined by guest co-host Demi Burnett. Demi talks about her engagement to Kristian and their life together in L.A. Then, Kristina Schulman is in studio talking about everything from her controversial time on “Bachelor in Paradise” to her relationships with Blake, Dean and Caelynn.

Be sure to rate and subscribe so you never miss an episode.

Thanks to our sponsors:

FabFitFun: FabFitFun.com/ code BHH

Door Dash: Download the Door Dash app/ code BACHELOR
